Posts.EditableText: I am completely new to Quest or even to attempting to create an MMORPG. I have several questions which I have attempted to find answer for on the web as well as searching and searching here. Quest is pretty simple to use as far as I can see when it comes to creating rooms and objects, even NPC's. Where my questions come in is related to creating combat and classes or guilds. If there is anyone out there that may know of some good tutorial sites or be willing to assist me with trying to learn how to do this it would be much appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: I know of a tutorial site.  It doesn't have any tutorials though, and it's pretty much the only ASL/QDK resource website (Atleast it will be) out there, besides Tr0n's and MaDbRiT's websites which have some useful scripts and libraries.

Posts.EditableText: I'm currently working on a MMORPG, and coding Gameboy's one, I might be able to write you instructions on how to make a basic RPG system, though it may take awhile as  I am programming two MMORPG's and have school to deal with, aside from the fact that my house is in chaos with no kitchen... but also because quest has no built-in RPG system you can have it how you want, and everyone wants it different. If you were to give me in greater deal of what you want to do, or what you've done so far, then I may be able to make you something....
